name: Ender Mobs Mod
short_description: The End is boring? Or are Enderman not enough? Then this is the mod for you: It adds 3 new ender mobs into minecraft, each with its own abillity, for example the EnderNivis can walk in water or rain without taking damage or the EnderIgnis can walk through fire or lava. All of them spawn in the End and on the Overworld in specific biomes.
summary: A Minecraft modification which adds new ender type mobs.
